mysite

Window reference

This section provides details on the properties for the following windows or components:

Windows

Element Description
Alembic Import Settings Use this component to customize the import of an Alembic file. The file must be located in a folder within your Unity project.
Alembic Clip Recorder Requires the Unity Recorder package, minimum version 2.0.0. Use the Alembic Recorder window to export an Alembic file. You can start and stop the recording manually, specify a single frame to record, or specify an interval based on start and end seconds or frame numbers.

Components

Element Description
Alembic Curves component A GameObject with an Alembic Curves component is an Alembic curve node.
Alembic Curves Renderer component If you did not import a Curve Render with an Alembic asset, the Alembic Curves Renderer component provides a basic representation of Alembic curves.
Alembic Custom Data component This component displays any additional data stored with each Face Set.
Alembic Exporter component Use this component to export GameObjects, Cameras, and Points (in the Particle System).
Alembic Point Cloud component Use this component to customize the shape and behavior of the point cloud.
Alembic Point Renderer component Use this component to customize the appearance of the particles in the point cloud.
Alembic Stream Player component Use this component to play back animation from the Alembic file in either Timeline or Unity Animation.

Timeline clip

Element Description
Alembic Shot Asset clip settings Use this component to specify where the Alembic Shot clip stops playback.
